tool_description: Organizes, processes, and manages multimedia assets including videos, images, audio files, and documents for course integration.

asset_name.description: Descriptive name for the media asset

asset_type.description: Type of asset: image, video, audio, document, animation

file_format.description: File format/extension (e.g., mp4, jpg, pdf, mp3)

error_messages: File too large: Maximum file size is 500MB.
Invalid asset_type: Use image, video, audio, document, or animation.
Unsupported format: File format not supported for the specified asset type.
Missing alt_text: Alt text required for image and video assets for accessibility.
Invalid file size: file_size_mb must be between 0.1 and 500.
usage: Provide asset_name, asset_type, file_format, and file_size_mb. Optionally specify course_id, tags, and alt_text for better organization and accessibility.

asset_id.description: Unique identifier for the stored asset

storage_url.description: URL path where the asset is stored

processing_status.description: Current processing status of the asset
